about_the_game: This free demo offers play of the every game mode included in the full game of Rock 'N Roll with limited play.  The normal game mode limits you to 1 life and no opportunities to earn extra lives to help extend your games.  The Hard Rock mode gives you a 30 second time limit to try out the fast and furious action within!  You can also complete the full tutorial that is part of the full game.  In the normal and Hard Rock game modes, there are background images of the word "DEMO" but it doesn't affect the gameplay at all.
detailed_description: This free demo offers play of the every game mode included in the full game of Rock 'N Roll with limited play.  The normal game mode limits you to 1 life and no opportunities to earn extra lives to help extend your games.  The Hard Rock mode gives you a 30 second time limit to try out the fast and furious action within!  You can also complete the full tutorial that is part of the full game.  In the normal and Hard Rock game modes, there are background images of the word "DEMO" but it doesn't affect the gameplay at all.
name: Rock 'N Roll Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: 1 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB graphics card minimum
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 our higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650 or AMD HD 6870 or above
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Your mission is simple. Billions on earth depend on you to save them from thousands of asteroids endangering their lives! Use your skills to control a space ship with real inertia and use a variety of exciting power-ups and attacks to give you the best chance possible at saving our home planet!
